alert.note: Alert for Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 7:08PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Morrow and southwestern Umatilla Counties through 730 PM PDT... At 707 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Ukiah, or 17 miles east of Heppner. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Morrow and southwestern Umatilla Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
